user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, linking it to the modified data file and the new scenario
  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the proper datafile attribute from the available list for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, locate and select the H2\Gas data file to be modified.

tasks.description: Create a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select or define the scenario attributes for 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities'.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories of the gas pipeline class, linking it to the modified data file and the new scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the objects within the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories for property update.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' and rename the clone to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone_transfer_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, identify the model to clone and apply the new name.

tasks.description: Update the cloned model to add the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the cloned model and update its scenario attributes.
